translation: Many mighty warriors have been killed and the sound of the drums is continuously being heard.27.183.
Wonderful type of arrows have been shot and because of them many fighters have expired.
When the demon-warriors of great might saw the goddess in person, they became senseless.28.184

gurmukhi: ਹਣੇ ਭੂਮਿ ਪਾਰੇ || ਕਿਤੇ ਸਿੰਘ ਫਾਰੇ ||
transliteration: Hane Bhoom(i) Pdare|| Kite Singh Phdare||
translation: Many brave fighters were torn by the lion and thrown on the ground.

transliteration: Kite Aap(u) Bhare, Jite Dait Bhdare||29||185||
translation: And many huge demons were personally killed and destroyed by the goddess.29.185.

gurmukhi: ਤਿਤੇ ਅੰਤ ਹਾਰੇ || ਬਡੇ ੲੀ ਅੜਿਅਾਰੇ ||
transliteration: Tite Ant Hdare|| Bade Oo Adidare||
translation: Many real heroes who stuck fast before the goddess.
And who were extremely hard-hearted and renowned for their mercilessness ultimately ran away.30.186.
The egoist warriors with brightened faces who ran forward.

transliteration: Hane Kaal Kdare|| Bhaje Roh Vdare||31||187||
translation: And also the mighty and furious heroes were killed by the dreadful death.31.187.

gurmukhi: ੲਿਹ ਬਿਧਿ ਦੁਸਟ ਪ੍ਰਜਾਰ ਕੈ ਸਸਤ੍ਰ ਅਸਤ੍ਰ ਕਰ ਲੀਨ ||
transliteration: In Bidh(i) Doust Prajaar Kai Sastra Astra Kar Loon||
translation: In this way, destroying the tyrants, Durga again wore her weapons and armour.

gurmukhi: ਬਾਣ ਬੂੰਦ ਪ੍ਰਿਥਮੈ ਬਰਖ ਸਿੰਘ ਨਾਦ ਪੁਨ ਕੀਨ ||੩੨||੧੮੮||
transliteration: Baan Boond Prithamai Barakh Singh Naad Poun Koon||32||188||
translation: At first she showered her arrows and then her lion roared heavily.32.188.

gurmukhi: ਸੁਨਯੋ ਸੁੰਭ ਰਾਯੰ || ਚੜਯੋ ਚੳੁਪ ਚਾਯੰ ||
transliteration: Sounyo Sounbh Raayan|| Chadyo Chaoup Chaayan||
translation: When the demon-king Sumbh heard all that had happened, he marched forward in great excitement.
